project_descr: Climate Change is  one of the most important threats to the development of South Sudan. Studies estimate that temperature rise in the country will be two and a half times higher than the global average.

outputs.output_descr: Climate change adaptation and efficient use of clean and renewable energy solutions lie at the heart of South Sudan’s pursuit of sustainable development. The economy has near complete dependence on carbon fuels.

South Sudan’s emission of green-house gases is negligible due to absence of significant manufacturing, it is extremely vulnerable to the impacts of climate change and extreme climate linked events, the provision renewable energy resolutions is critical.

project_title: climate change adaptation and renewable energy project
